citeinfo.title: Bathymetric Depth Contours for Narragansett Bay; s44hby97
citeinfo.othercit: Suggested bibliographic reference: RIGIS, 1989. Bathymetric Depth Contours for Narragansett Bay; s44hby97. Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) Data Distribution System, URL: http://www.rigis.org, Environmental Data Center, University of Rhode Island, Kingston, Rhode Island (last date accessed: 30 September 2014).

descript.abstract: This data is bathymetric depth contours for Narragansett Bay and Block Island Sound at twenty foot intervals as depicted on NOAA nautical charts.
descript.purpose: Bathymetric depth contours for Narragansett Bay and Block Island Sound at twenty foot intervals as depicted on NOAA nautical charts.

procstep.procdesc: Spot depths manually digitized from source and converted to grid in arcinfo and resultant converted to polygon coverage digitzing rms - 005 fuzzy - 1 meter
Updated Point of Contact information for this dataset from "RIGIS Coordinator" to "Chris Damon."
